allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - JubileeEnterprise.com platform

Complete faith-based enterprise platform including:
- 3 API services \(Codex, Inspire, Continuum\)
- 8 website projects \(JubileeVerse, JubileeInternet, etc.\)
- JubileeBrowser desktop application \(.NET 8/WPF\)
- Shared packages \(@jubilee/shared, database, config\)
- Infrastructure \(Docker, migrations, nginx\)
- Comprehensive documentation

Three-database architecture:
- Codex: Identity, auth, RBAC
- Inspire: Content, conversations
- Continuum: User data, settings

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add wwBibleweb.com IDNS folder management system

- Node.js server with API for folder/subfolder CRUD operations
- Dark theme web UI with grid layout for DNS entry management
- YAML configuration file \(idns.yaml\) for storing folder metadata
- Features: managed status toggle, masked resolution URLs \(mres\)
- Auto-sorting of entries alphabetically on save
- localStorage caching for pending changes and expanded state
- Inspire domain format: inspire://*.foldername

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(wsl bash -c "which psql || sudo apt-get install postgresql-client -y 2>/dev/null; psql --version")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add InspireCodex and InspireContinuum websites with Codex Services dashboard

- Add InspireCodex.com admin dashboard with health monitoring
- Add Codex Services panel displaying iDNS entries by type and JubileeSSO accounts
- Add InspireContinuum.com server foundation
- Update wwBibleweb.com with IDNS database sync and webspace entries
- Consolidate database usage to Codex database

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add authentication endpoints and Qdrant infrastructure, update JubileeBrowser for WPF

- Add complete authentication module to InspireCodex.com server \(login, register, logout, refresh tokens\)
- Password hashing matches JubileeVerse: PBKDF2 with 100000 iterations, 64 bytes, sha512, salt:hash format
- Create Qdrant infrastructure with InspireCodex and Flywheel collections
- Update JubileeBrowser.com documentation to reflect WPF/WebView2 technology
- Update browser test page for WebView2 API and InspireCodex integration
- Configure browser API endpoints for InspireCodex.com

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/17/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -c "CREATE DATABASE codex;")

Bash("/c/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -U postgres -h 127.0.0.1 -p 5433 -d codex -c "
CREATE EXTENSION IF NOT EXISTS ""uuid-ossp"";

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users \(
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4\(\),
    email VARCHAR\(255\) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password_hash TEXT NOT NULL,
    display_name VARCHAR\(255\),
    created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
\);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS session \(
    sid VARCHAR\(255\) PRIMARY KEY,
    sess JSON NOT NULL,
    expire TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL
\);

CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS idx_session_expire ON session\(expire\);
")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add jubilee://settings internal page with WebUI bridge and heartbeat tracking

- Implement comprehensive jubilee://settings page with Chrome/Edge-style UI
- Add JavaScript-to-C# WebView2 bridge for settings communication
- Implement settings persistence with SettingsManager integration
- Add heartbeat mechanism for InspireContinuum session tracking
- Update Settings page typography: white primary text, gold \(#E6AC00\) accents
- Add custom scrollbar styling for Settings page
- Fix InspireContinuum heartbeat endpoint with proper upsert handling

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash("C:/Program Files/PostgreSQL/18/bin/psql.exe" -p 5433 -U postgres -d codex -c "SELECT extname FROM pg_extension;")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive UI enhancements and window state persistence to JubileeOutlook

Features:
- Add gold split-button "New Mail" with dropdown menu \(New Mail, New Meeting options\)
- Implement taskbar-aware maximize behavior using Win32 interop \(WM_GETMINMAXINFO\)
- Add persistent window state \(position, size, maximized state, panel widths\)
- Add animated gold accent bar at bottom with JubileeVerse-style wave animation
- Improve folder selection UI with full-width gold highlight

Technical changes:
- Win32 API integration for multi-monitor aware window maximization
- TranslateTransform-based GPU-accelerated animation for accent bar
- Panel width persistence for FolderPane \(250px default\) and MessageList \(400px default\)
- Window coordinate validation to ensure visibility on current monitor config
- Added AppRailControl, ApplicationViewModel, AuthenticationManager
- Added SecureStorageService for secure credential storage
- Added Material Symbols and Roboto font resources

UI improvements:
- Split-button with primary action \(New Mail\) and dropdown trigger \(arrow\)
- Inbox folder selected by default with gold highlight extending to panel edge
- Folder item styling updated \(removed rounded corners, margins for full-width selection\)
- Email icon replaces pencil icon in New Mail button and dropdown

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add static server for JubileeInspire.com

- Create server.js to serve static files with clean URL routing
- Update package.json to remove ES modules type declaration
- Fixes blank page issue on production

 Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

tunnel: c4c875e2-55a9-4ad7-a0e9-36c391229c0b
credentials-file: C:\\Users\\elian\\.cloudflared\\c4c875e2-55a9-4ad7-a0e9-36c391229c0b.json

  - hostname: www.jubileeinspire.com
    service: http://localhost:3001

  # JubileeVerse - AI chatbot \(advanced\)

    service: http://localhost:3000
  - hostname: www.jubileeverse.com
    service: http://localhost:3000

  # InspireCodex - API service
  - hostname: inspirecodex.com
    service: http://localhost:3100
  - hostname: www.inspirecodex.com
    service: http://localhost:3100

  # InspireContinuum - Continuum API
  - hostname: inspirecontinuum.com
    service: http://localhost:3101
  - hostname: www.inspirecontinuum.com
    service: http://localhost:3101

  # wwBibleweb - Webspace hosting
  - hostname: wwbibleweb.com
    service: http://localhost:3847
  - hostname: www.wwbibleweb.com
    service: http://localhost:3847

  # JubileeBrowser - Browser downloads
  - hostname: jubileebrowser.com
    service: http://localhost:3200
  - hostname: www.jubileebrowser.com
    service: http://localhost:3200

  # CelestialPaths - Domain registrar
  - hostname: celestialpaths.com
    service: http://localhost:3300
  - hostname: www.celestialpaths.com
    service: http://localhost:3300

  # JubileeWebsites - AI Website Generator
  - hostname: jubileewebsites.com
    service: http://localhost:3008
  - hostname: www.jubileewebsites.com
    service: http://localhost:3008

  # Catch-all \(required\)
  - service: http_status:404
''@ | Set-Content -Path ''C:\\Users\\elian\\.cloudflared\\config.yml'' -Encoding UTF8")
